author: craigmcc
msg: Rethrow an IOException that is thrown by an included servlet.  The particular
case at hand was when <jsp:include> was used to reference a non-existent
page.  The FileNotFoundException was getting silently swallowed here.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the server information returned by ServletContext.getServerInfo() to
use a slash to separate the server name and version info.

author: craigmcc
msg: Finish implementing the new 2.3 methods on WrappedRequest.

author: craigmcc
msg: Ant and relative paths strike again!
